name: ferrishare
description: Ferrishare is a self-hosted file and paste sharing platform that supports drag-and-drop uploads, expiration times, and password protection. Itâ€™s aimed at teams and individuals who want quick, private link-based sharing.
features: File Sharing: Drag-and-drop uploads, Expiration times, Password protection. Quick private sharing.
